attributes.title: um....
attributes.review: I do not tolerate pornography!!!! 😡😡😡😡 it has links to so many pornos and it is disgusting!! I can’t believe he would do this 😤😭 as soon as the app opened Mr. Trump messaged me personally and asked if he could peg me 😵🤢😰 this deserves 0 stars!!

attributes.title: DESTROYED MY PHONE
attributes.review: This app literally made my phone glitch and close apps randomly! It also kept sending me CONSTANT alerts that I couldn’t turn off. HORRIBLE APP, have to throw my phone away now.
Took forever to download (way longer then any app should). I instantly deleted it after it was a waste of time.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Very terrible app. Took for ever to download will never be using this trash app again. Apple needs to get rid of this app I think it gave my phone a virus

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I opened this app the find a horrific picture of a burnt cheeto in the mirror getting a spray tan. it was our wonderful and accomplished president, donald j trump. it was an solicited picture of his penis. the penis was disgusting looking, and shaped like a croissant. will be calling corporate to sue for emotional distress

attributes.title: The worst!
attributes.review: The fact that trump is banning TikTok Bc it’s violating our privacy? The fact when you first open the app they ask for your phone number!! Worst app ever!

attributes.title: Laggy and slow
attributes.review: App as a whole is really hard to maneuver and makes my phone laggy and slow

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: First i open it to see this horrific alien.. just burnt my eyes 😔.. then the alien was waving.. that made me think he was going to slap me and that’s harassment! take down this app right now
The app took 32 days to download and upon opening the app my house immediately caught fire. Cannot say i recommend to anyone who isn’t looking to barbecue their belongings.🍊🔥

attributes.title: This app is false.
attributes.review: The app may look like Donald Trumps official app but it isn’t . The app is very false with a lot of false information. I wouldn’t download or even consider downloading it. Just no
